description:
It`s finally time! The brothers are enjoying their much-awaited trip together. But when they ask their trip leader, Beelzebub, the plans for the next day, they learn it`s nothing but sushi, sushi, and more sushi.  Later, a playful pillow fight spurs Belphegor to confront his brothers about what`s been weighing on his mind.
Source: crunchyroll
